jokes.text: I went to buy some camo pants but couldn’t find any.
I always find elevator jokes to be uplifting.
Most people are shocked when they find out how bad I am as an electrician.
I’ve had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn’t it.
I failed math so many times at school, I can’t even count
Hi I'm Cliff. Drop over sometime.
I made a song about tortilla once, now it's more like a wrap.
I found a book called How to Solve 50% of Your Problems. So I bought 2.
I stayed up all night wondering where the sun went, and then it dawned on me.
Justice is a dish best served cold. Otherwise, it's just water.
I have an inferiority complex, but it's not a very good one.
A man walked into his house and was delighted when he discovered that someone had stolen all of his lamps.
When my toothpaste dropped to the ground, I was crestfallen.
